Html:
This library is superb ....

Cannot believe you have done all this - outstanding.

Re your comment about the ratings though ... I dont seem to be able to set one - clicking on the stars doesnt work ...

Thank you for the compliment. I built all of this as just infra-structure for my Napoleonic game engine, but it is general enough that I don't see it fostering competition; so here it is for the world to enjoy.

I will try to follow up with CodePlex about the ratings not working.

Pieter

Found it!

On the Downloads page, select Review This Release; you will be presented with a dialog box where you can rate the release, and comment on it.
